=====
..   Notes
..   -----
   
   
.. [#targ] Orientation 'target' implies described RNA could base-pair to snRcnag12093 guide; 'as-guide' means that search sequence is antisense to described RNA, thus like the complementary snRcnag12093 guide. In this case no further analysis was done. 'Conserved' describes occurrence of target at same location in homologous genes in species beyond *Cryptococcus* that could express snRcnag12093 homologous snoRNAs (:doc:`snrcnag12093-species`).
